name: XWUI Menu Component
description: Navigation menu component for displaying hierarchical menu items. Supports horizontal and vertical modes, light/dark themes, nested menus, icons, and selection states. Uses XWUIItemGroup internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the menu

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of menu items to display

id.description: Unique identifier for the menu item

label.description: Label text for the menu item

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string for the menu item

href.description: URL link for the menu item

disabled.description: Whether the menu item is disabled

divider.description: Whether this item is a divider/separator

selected.description: ID of the currently selected menu item
